author: dlr
msg: JavaHL: A follow-up to r24318, improving the tests for the new
(testMergeInfoRetrieval): Enhance the test for the getMergeInfo()

the WC, and committed merge info inherited from higher in the

author: dlr
msg: JavaHL: Improve JavaDoc for commit() APIs.
(commit): Improve @return JavaDoc and add missing @since tag on
interface.  Change JavaDoc to @see on implementations.

author: xsteve
msg: Don't display the svn-status-version output on startup
(svn-status-version): Display the version information buffer only
